name: Midnight Quest
description: Midnight Quest is an adventure style point and click game. You play as an assistant to a brilliant scientist who conducts experiments with time. Once in the laboratory, an accident occurred, but you can fix everything by solving fascinating puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Storage: 1 GB available space
